# GKTurnBasedParticipant.Status.matching

**Case**

The participant represents an unfilled position in the match that Game Center promises to fill when needed.

## Declaration

```swift
case matching
```

## Discussion

When you make this participant the next person to take a turn in the match, Game Center fills the position and updates the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedParticipant/status-swift.property] and [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedParticipant/playerID] properties.

## Constants

- **GKTurnBasedParticipant.Status.unknown**: The participant is in an unexpected state.
- **GKTurnBasedParticipant.Status.invited**: The participant is invited to the match, but hasn’t responded to the invitation.
- **GKTurnBasedParticipant.Status.declined**: The participant declines the invitation to join the match, automatically terminating the match.
- **GKTurnBasedParticipant.Status.active**: The participant joins the match and is an active player.
- **GKTurnBasedParticipant.Status.done**: The participant leaves the match.
